sentence.Network_en: Bhavishya Purana explicitly identifies them with Zoroastrianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 未来往世书明确地把他们鉴别为琐罗亚斯德教徒.

...a Tîrtha认为毗湿奴往世书（Vaishnavite puranas）是萨埵|喜往世书，湿婆往世书（Shaivite puranas）是答磨|Tamas (philosophy)|暗往世书，仅仅喜往世书（sat.
...ayu purana，风神伐由）》把音乐称为乾达婆。往世书提到的音乐是在牺牲仪式不同阶段中演奏的。《马尔坎德耶往世书（Markandeya purana）》有一段萨拉斯瓦蒂和蛇王阿湿婆多罗（Ashvatara）的对话，书中女神萨拉斯瓦蒂给予了这位一心只想.

means.word_mean: 1. a body of 18 works written between the first and 11th centuries and incorporating legends and speculative histories of the universe and myths and customary observances
